seo.title: crypto interest accounts for earning up to 13.5% APY
seo.description: Open an interest account and get profitable APY on your digital assets. Enjoy outstanding rates for USDT, USDC, BUSD, DAI, CHO, CRPT, BTC, ETH.

main.title: crypto interest accounts for earning up to 13.5% APY
main.description: Open an interest account and get profitable APY on your digital assets. Enjoy outstanding rates for USDT, USDC, BUSD, DAI, CHO, CRPT, BTC, ETH.
main.description_fast: Outpace traditional market yields with Choise.com

savingsAccount.title: safe and secure
savingsAccount.description_1: We are a licensed, fully regulated financial institution in the European Union.
savingsAccount.description_2: We provide the best crypto interest accounts that are protected with a 3-layer security and an anti-fraud protocol.

array.title: savings account with no minimum balance
array.description: Feel comfortable while earning with the Choise.com interest account with no minimum balance
array.content: Use any amount of crypto you want and get up to 13.5% APY at the end of the period

array.title: earn interest – no concerns about extra fees
array.content: Do not worry about additional costs while opening your interest account. Just choose the cryptocurrency and start making profit

array.title: flexible & Fixed options
array.description: Manage your interest account the way you like
array.content: Withdraw any time with our Flexible interest accounts, or receive higher yield and more terms variety with Fixed.

array.title: sign up in Choise.com App
array.description: Launch your Choise.com App. Go to the “Earn” section and click on “Interest accounts”

array.title: select an asset
array.description: Check the list of available assets and rates upon its duration and APR. Choose the coin that best fits your goals and estimate its interest rate based on your deposit

array.title: open the interest account
array.description: You can close the deposit at any time and return your deposit without an accumulated interest. All your earned interest wouldn’t be calculated
